name: msgpackr-extract
author: Kris Zyp
description: Node addon for string extraction for msgpackr

scripts.prebuild:darwin: prebuildify --arch=arm64 --target 17.0.1 && prebuildify --arch=arm64 --target 16.9.0 && prebuildify --arch=arm64 --target 14.17.6 && prebuildify --target 17.0.1 && prebuildify --target 16.9.0 && prebuildify --target 14.17.6 && prebuildify --target 12.18.0
scripts.before-publish: prebuildify-ci download && prebuildify --target 17.0.1 && prebuildify --target 16.9.0 && prebuildify --target 14.17.6 && prebuildify --target 12.18.0 && prebuildify --target electron@13.1.4
